response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $100 to you. Considering its value to you stands at $150, I am proposing to sell it to you for $125. This price reflects its true worth while allowing us to share some of the benefits with you. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.", "product_price": 125}
